str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
A trumpet, the sound of a trumpet. Perhaps from salos; a trumpet.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Unseen, not obvious, inconspicuous, indistinct. Hidden, figuratively, indistinct.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To prepare; mid: I prepare, make preparations. From para and a derivative of skeuos; to furnish aside, i.e. Get ready.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A war, battle, strife. From pelomai; warfare.
